entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 528,000,000 reported in the network role http://itacunibanco.com/role/BalanceSheet, http://itacunibanco.com/role/StockholdersEquityDetails should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of -907,000,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://itacunibanco.com/role/StatementOfChangesInStockholdersEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : BRL Decimals of TreasuryShares : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 26.0.9 - itubform20f_2023.htm 87345
